CustomField.description: Checked if Contact not marked "deceased" and either: 1.Contact is 60+ YO with 5 gifts over last 10 years, 2.Contact is 70+ YO with 3 gifts over last 5 years.
CustomField.formula:
AND ( Deceased__pc = FALSE, OR(
AND( Number_of_Gifts_Last_10_Years__c + Number_of_Partial_SC_Last_10_Years__c + Number_of_SC_Last_10_Years__c >= 5 , PersonContact.Age__c >=60), AND( Number_of_Gifts_Last_5_Years__c + Number_of_Partial_SC_Last_5_Years__c + Number_of_Partial_SC_Last_5_Years__c >= 3 , PersonContact.Age__c >=70) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Checked if Contact not marked "deceased" and either: 1.Contact is 60+ YO with 5 gifts over last 10 years, 2.Contact is 70+ YO with 3 gifts over last 5 years.
CustomField.label: PG Candidate
